set_length_measurement_description: In order to start your project, you must first determine the proportions in the selected DWG plan. To do this, select an area whose length measurement you know. Then use the ruler tool to connect the two points and in the next step enter the distance between these two points.
set_length_measurement_image_info: All further calculations are based on this selected length measurement. You can also adjust the length measurement later.
